Autonomous Agents in Society

Agents‚ÄîAI systems that can autonomously achieve goals with little human instruction‚Äîare a major focus of tech companies and investors. Recent advances in foundation models like ChatGPT and Claude enable agents to interact with various tools and services, but they still face limitations in reliability, reasoning, and digital tool use. The development of autonomous agents has the potential to revolutionize society, but it also poses significant challenges, including cost-prohibitive processing power.

Key Concepts:

  • Autonomous systems
  • Foundation models
  • Scaffolding software
  • Complex task completion
  • effective implementation
  • safe agents
  • societal impacts
  • governance solutions
